rows.ihm_output: Page 1 lists: Name (MV GREAT ROYAL), IMO (9083081). Missing: Type of vessel, Gross tonnage, Port of registry, Date of delivery.
rows.remarks: The initial particulars section on the front page (Page 1) is incomplete compared to the required minimum information provided in the MEPC example for identification purposes.

rows.mepc_reference: MEPC.379(80) Page 44 - Required Attachments (Inventory Development Steps)
rows.ihm_output: TOC lists: Step-1 (Collection, Page 24), Step-2 (Assessment, Page 29), Step-3 (Final VSCP, Page 45), Step-5 (Preparation of Part 1, Page 96).
rows.remarks: The report structure follows the logical development steps (Collection, Assessment/VSCP, Preparation) required for developing the Inventory for existing ships, corresponding to the required attachments.

rows.mepc_reference: MEPC.379(80) Appendix 2 (Pages 17, 19) - Standard Format Structure (Parts I, II, III)
rows.ihm_output: Part-II (Page 9), Part-III (Page 10) including III-1, III-2, III-3, III-4 (Pages 10-12). Part 1 preparation (Page 96).
rows.remarks: The report structure correctly identifies and separates Parts I, II, and III, including the mandated subdivisions for Part III (stores, liquids, gases, consumables).

rows.mepc_reference: MEPC.379(80) Appendix 1 - Items to be Listed (Table A and Table B)
rows.ihm_output: Appendix 1 includes Table A (Page 101), Table B (Page 102), Table C (Page 103), and Table D (Page 105).
rows.remarks: All required tables (A and B) and the recommended supplementary tables (C and D) are included and correctly referenced in the appendices list.
The MD form is included as an appendix, fulfilling the documentation requirement, despite the internal numbering change.

rows.mepc_reference: MEPC.379(80) Appendix 7 (Form of Supplier's Declaration of Conformity)
rows.remarks: The SDoC form is included as an appendix, fulfilling the documentation requirement, despite the internal numbering change.
